headline: Fortive (NYSE:FTV) Reaffirms Q2 2025 Earnings Guidance of US$0.44-US$0.49 EPS
summary: Fortive (NYSE:FTV) recently reaffirmed its earnings guidance for the second quarter of 2025, expecting diluted net earnings per share between $0.44 and $0.49. This stable outlook may have provided some support to their shares, which rose by 4% over the past week. This movement occurred amid broader market gains, aligning with the overall uptrend. As the market climbed 1.5% with anticipation around U.S.-China trade talks and corporate earnings, Fortive's performance seems to have echoed this...

headline: Fortive price target raised to $79 from $78 at RBC Capital
summary: RBC Capital raised the firm’s price target on Fortive (FTV) to $79 from $78 and keeps a Sector Perform rating on the shares ahead of its Investor Day presentation discussion the Ralliant spin. For New-Fortive, the firm expects a portfolio review across workflow management software and healthcare businesses, spotlighting its high earnings visibility with above-50% recurring revenues, the analyst tells investors in a research note. headline: Ralliant to Share Vision for the Future as Standalone Precision Technologies Leader
summary: RALEIGH, N.C., June 10, 2025--As previously disclosed, Ralliant Corporation ("Ralliant" or the "Company") is hosting its 2025 Investor Day today where members of the Company’s newly formed leadership team will discuss its growth strategy and financial priorities as a standalone public company following the pending separation from Fortive Corporation ("Fortive") (NYSE: FTV) on June 28, 2025.

headline: Fortive to Outline Value Creation Strategy and Financial Framework
summary: EVERETT, Wash., June 10, 2025--Fortive Corporation ("Fortive") (NYSE: FTV) today is hosting its 2025 Investor Day with members of the Fortive leadership team detailing plans for driving sustainable growth and delivering shareholder value following the pending separation of Ralliant Corporation on June 28, 2025.
